mapper.insert: insert into item (item_category, item_name, item_price, item_img, item_content, item_create_date, item_read_count, item_point) values(#{item_category}, #{item_name}, #{item_price}, #{item_img}, #{item_content}, now(), #{item_read_count}, #{item_point})

insert into jpsdb.order (user_num, order_date, order_method, order_addr, order_state, order_total_price, order_total_point, order_com_memo, order_fee, order_del, order_del_num, order_del_memo, order_coupon_use, order_coupon, order_point_use, order_point_amount, order_final_price) values(#{user_num}, now(), #{order_method}, #{order_addr}, 0, #{order_total_price}, #{order_total_point}, #{order_com_memo}, #{order_fee}, #{order_del}, #{order_del_num}, #{order_del_memo}, #{order_coupon_use}, #{order_coupon}, #{order_point_use}, #{order_point_amount}, #{order_final_price})
